title: Gluten free large white loaf for bread machine
ingredients: ['2 cups full to the brim of white rice flour (you could use one cup of brown rice flour and one white if you wish)', '1/2 cup full to the brim of tapioca flour', '1/2 cup full to the brim of potato starch (not potato flour!)', '1/2 cup full to brim of Coffee-Mate® (original or lite)', '1 heaped teaspoon psyllium husk powder (add two if leaving out xanthum or guar gum)', '2 1/2 teaspoons xanthan gum or guar gum (or half of each)', '3 tablespoons sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 1/2 cups full to brim of lukewarm water', '1 teaspoon cider vinegar (see footnote)', '1 whole egg', '2 egg whites', '5 tablespoons melted baking margarine', '1 1/2 tablespoons Hovis® fast action yeast (see footnote)']
